block.p: ''A Tool for Taking the Lay of the Land'' (News Watch, April 27), about the Leica LRF 800 Rangemaster, which measures distances between 33 feet and a half-mile, suggests that the device will be a boon to ''hunters, golfers or gardeners.'' But Rule 14.3 of the United States Golf Association's ''Rules of Golf'' states that ''the player shall not use any artificial device or unusual equipment'' for gauging or measuring distance. Good luck, hunters and gardeners.
